title: FireDAOJackie_Z
author: FireDAOJackie_Z
content: We have seen high contrast of market situations in real business world and the crypto space recently: Banks like SVB went bankrupt and caused a lot of fear and anxiety in the market; after a price drop within a short period, Bitcoin has gone up excessively to a high price which seems to be stable for a while; ETH and other big name altcoins have also enjoyed a price surge. More people are predicting that the next bull market is around the corner.  Is this true ? Or are you ready for the next bull market ? I am with FireDAO team, in charge of the global community. Please let me know if you are interested in our new project.

comments.author: jossiel
comments.body: Quote from: FireDAOJackie_Z on March 16, 2023, 03:33:13 AMMore people are predicting that the next bull market is around the corner.  Is this true ? Yes, it's true because we can see on how it reflects to the market. If it's not true then we're just living with day to day dumping scene from the market but it's the opposite.Quote from: FireDAOJackie_Z on March 16, 2023, 03:33:13 AMOr are you ready for the next bull market ? I am. I'm just waiting for it to come and preparing my share on it to be taken when the price is right. But as of now, it's better to keep on checking ourselves and portfolios until it comes.

comments.author: FireDAOJackie_Z
comments.body: Quote from: jossiel on March 16, 2023, 08:29:16 PMQuote from: FireDAOJackie_Z on March 16, 2023, 03:33:13 AMMore people are predicting that the next bull market is around the corner.  Is this true ? Yes, it's true because we can see on how it reflects to the market. If it's not true then we're just living with day to day dumping scene from the market but it's the opposite.Quote from: FireDAOJackie_Z on March 16, 2023, 03:33:13 AMOr are you ready for the next bull market ? I am. I'm just waiting for it to come and preparing my share on it to be taken when the price is right. But as of now, it's better to keep on checking ourselves and portfolios until it comes.Good for you. Opportunity always favors those who are well prepared. Our project FireDAO was launched on Arbitrum One mainnet and will update more features in the future. Hope you'll be interested. Please refer to this thread https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5441307.0 to find more detailed info. OG round to the public will be coming soon and please stay tuned.

comments.author: killerfrost
comments.body: What we always consider an understandable trigger point is the bitcoin halving event.Right now, I'm seeing a lot of volatility and chaos in the information, as well as ambiguity in the psychology, and I also like that skepticism, or fomo, is inevitable. It's only a matter of time until we learn enough from the lessons.

comments.author: jacafbiz
comments.body: The market moves in a cycle and I believe we have passed through the maximum pain level, the only thing we need to watch out for is for the FED and Central bankers all over the world to turn on the taps, we need this to make the bull run sustainable and there are indications this is going to happen soon because people have started talking about the $2Trillion the FED wants to pump into the banks, this is a huge amount, feeling like this is what makes people gamble with their money.

comments.author: ethereumhunter
comments.body: Talking about the signs of a bull market, we can only know that the prices of many coins can increase suddenly and surpass the previous ATH prices, especially altcoins. Usually, the first thing is altcoins will get big pumps, while bitcoin has increased but not too significantly. But it is also possible that the bitcoin price will increase first to a certain level then the altcoin season will come and make many coins experience a price increase.It looks like the bull market is getting close because the price of bitcoin has started to get a price reversal which is indicated by an increase from the previous lowest price. But it seems we still have to wait some more because the bitcoin price is far from the previous ATH and needs to break every high.

comments.author: FairUser
comments.body: The most obvious is that the OP has begun to hear about new projects and areas that sound quite abstract. And trends are constantly being drawn and introduced into this market, but I think of BTC timelines as having. I also realize that many wallets with large BTC holdings are increasing, actually I am expecting to start Q3 2023 we will be less gloomy.

comments.author: wxa7115
comments.body: Quote from: killerfrost on March 17, 2023, 01:56:26 AMWhat we always consider an understandable trigger point is the bitcoin halving event.Right now, I'm seeing a lot of volatility and chaos in the information, as well as ambiguity in the psychology, and I also like that skepticism, or fomo, is inevitable. It's only a matter of time until we learn enough from the lessons.Correct, there are instances in which the price can move up really quickly, but we know this is the result of FOMO and such a movement cannot last for long.The halving so far has been the main signal that tells us a bull market is forming, this does not mean the price will move up the very next day, but as miners get less bitcoin for each block then they need to sell for a higher price to remain profitable and this drives the price of bitcoin upward.

comments.author: gaston castano
comments.body: the signs maybe when the market is slowly recovery and fud will decrease, and there will me more fomos.after halving btc in 2024 and world economic start to growing again, that so far i know.

comments.author: cryptoaddictchie
comments.body: Basically much better indicator is a good in cash flow. We already knew what history always do and its really a cycle. We can say that wr are still in bear market but in consolidation phase and yet to enter a greenish cycle. But with the current news and events that could also be a factor. More positive vibes could lead to a continuous movement upward.

comments.author: avikz
comments.body: Quote from: FireDAOJackie_Z on March 16, 2023, 03:33:13 AMWe have seen high contrast of market situations in real business world and the crypto space recently: Banks like SVB went bankrupt and caused a lot of fear and anxiety in the market; after a price drop within a short period, Bitcoin has gone up excessively to a high price which seems to be stable for a while; ETH and other big name altcoins have also enjoyed a price surge. More people are predicting that the next bull market is around the corner.  Is this true ? Or are you ready for the next bull market ? I am with FireDAO team, in charge of the global community. Please let me know if you are interested in our new project. That's how it should be! We have had multiple discussions in the forum about decoupling traditional markets from the crypto market. And I am happy to see the current trend. When the traditional market goes down, the crypto should serve as a exit point for the traditional investors. I believe that's exactly what is happening and for good. I am not too much bullish for a bull run of cryptocurrency now. What price surges we are are seeing should stabilize shortly. I believe that's always better than a unrealistic bull run and a collapse afterwards.

comments.author: Gayong88
comments.body: If I am not mistaken There are several signs indicating the next bull market for cryptocurrencies is in sight.1. Bitcoin's recent rally has been a leading indicator that the bear market has ended and a new bull market has begun;2. There are several top 10 cryptocurrencies that could potentially lead to the next bull market;3. The last one, I think, is the most awaited moment, namely the Halving Bitcoin which will come in 2024, which is expected to be a catalyst for the next bull market.To be "ready" for the next bull market or any market for that matter I haven't made any investment decisions yet.

comments.body: Quote from: FireDAOJackie_Z on March 17, 2023, 01:28:44 AMQuote from: jossiel on March 16, 2023, 08:29:16 PMQuote from: FireDAOJackie_Z on March 16, 2023, 03:33:13 AMOr are you ready for the next bull market ? I've been hearing about the arbitrum project but not with yours. It seems that it's getting the traction as of the moment and that's why projects like yours should capitalize that attention and popularity that it gets.

comments.author: lobo13hf
comments.body: I guess the fact that there has been many small increase in term of price could somehow indicate that the market is turning towards bull market, but honestly no one could really knows, the thing with bullrun and bearish is basically when the tides are turning, majority already caught off guard basically too late to make profit out of it, but surely if you always accumulate you wouldn't miss the chance.

comments.author: justdimin
comments.body: Quote from: avikz on March 17, 2023, 09:22:26 AMQuote from: FireDAOJackie_Z on March 16, 2023, 03:33:13 AMWe have seen high contrast of market situations in real business world and the crypto space recently: Banks like SVB went bankrupt and caused a lot of fear and anxiety in the market; after a price drop within a short period, Bitcoin has gone up excessively to a high price which seems to be stable for a while; ETH and other big name altcoins have also enjoyed a price surge. More people are predicting that the next bull market is around the corner.  Is this true ? Or are you ready for the next bull market ? I am with FireDAO team, in charge of the global community. Please let me know if you are interested in our new project. That's how it should be! We have had multiple discussions in the forum about decoupling traditional markets from the crypto market. And I am happy to see the current trend. When the traditional market goes down, the crypto should serve as a exit point for the traditional investors. I believe that's exactly what is happening and for good. I am not too much bullish for a bull run of cryptocurrency now. What price surges we are are seeing should stabilize shortly. I believe that's always better than a unrealistic bull run and a collapse afterwards. I would guess that the reason why the traditional markets go up or down matters to crypto as well. When it was a global pandemic and printing of a lot of money that was a good thing for stock owners and the bitcoin owners because fiat going down in value means these assets would go up in value.However when it is a stock market crash, like what is happening right now to the banks, that means crypto would go up since it's not having a crash like stocks. This is why it's quite important to remember that you should be having a bit of a good result in the end and have some sort of big profit depending on why the traditional markets move, not which direction but why.

comments.author: Bollexz1
comments.body: QuoteOr are you ready for the next bull market?We all are tired of the bearish that has existed for quite a while now. We just want to start seeing the green signs on our portfolios. Though, the total Market capitalization continues to grow since the beginning of the year. So I pray it keeps at it.

comments.author: kevinzxz
comments.body: Quote from: Bollexz1 on March 17, 2023, 11:45:01 PMQuoteOr are you ready for the next bull market?We all are tired of the bearish that has existed for quite a while now. We just want to start seeing the green signs on our portfolios. Though, the total Market capitalization continues to grow since the beginning of the year. So I pray it keeps at it. you don't need to worry, because it has become a cryptocurrency cycle, so every time there is a high increase (bull run), then there will definitely be a deep correction (bear run), therefore we must take advantage of the cycle that occurs to get a big profit, so now is the right time for us to invest in cryptocurrency and hold, because if the next bull run occurs, then of course the price of cryptocurrency will increase very high (create a new ATH price), so we will get a big profit from investing in cryptocurrency at this time (do not miss this opportunity).

comments.author: FireDAOJackie_Z
comments.body: Quote from: kevinzxz on March 18, 2023, 02:54:17 AMQuote from: Bollexz1 on March 17, 2023, 11:45:01 PMQuoteOr are you ready for the next bull market?We all are tired of the bearish that has existed for quite a while now. Invest in Bitcoin any time is fine but speaking of altcoins, that might need a lot of market analysis and the perfect timing. But still you are right, please do not miss this opportunity and let's invest wisely. If you are interested, please refer to this thread https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5441307.0 to know more about our project FireDAO and hope you'll like it.

comments.author: DapanasFruit
comments.body: Are we right now on the bull run? Actually am not so sure if we are already in the bull run but there is no question that there has been a surge for the past many days and that can be good. However, the surge can be due to the downfall of some regional banks in USA which lead to many to question the viability of the banking and financial system of the country. Now, we have to remember that eventually the banking system will recover as this is not 2008 again. The government is doing all it can with its muscle to contain any possible contagion. Now, the question is: Once the dust settles...will cryptocurrencies also go back to where they were before this problem?
